Pursuant to our letter dated October 22, 2021, we enclose herewith communication relating to conference call as per Regulation 30(6) Para A of Part A of Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015.

The said conference call with the Institutional Investor/Analyst on Monday, November 01, 2021 was to discuss the financial performance of the Company for the Second Quarter ended September 30, 2021. ....
